fetchedMessages.content: for the mentally challenged amongst you this is a rankslide, it's a required part of uniform
<@&679027197947805716> Maybe fucking read the information channel and upload your rankslide like you're fucking supposed to instead of having me baby you through it in game, it's embarrassing

embeds.title: EMPLOYMENT
embeds.description:
All service personnel are to abide by the Citizens Job Act 2021
If you hold a primary job (i.e. Cabinet Minister or Metropolitan Police Officer (Not Special Constables) you need to ask to become a reserve. In order to become a reserve, speak to the Warrant Officer Surface Fleet or Warrant Officer Reserves.

embeds.title: UNIFORMS
embeds.description:
Uniforms can be found here:
https://www.roblox.com/groups/2876798/UK-Royal-Navy-Stores#!/about

Any other uniforms not in this group or issued by the quartermaster are not to be worn. Editing uniform is also not allowed and can result in disciplinary action.

embeds.title: ACTIVITY
embeds.description:
It is expected that full time service personnel are to attend 3 trainings a week excluding the end of week inspection and Reservists are to attend at least one training a week excluding inspections.

Failure to meet the quota will result in activity strikes.
For full information about attendance read the "Attendance Policy" below.

embeds.title: GOING ON LEAVE
embeds.description:
We all have lives and need to go somewhere, do something or need to clear personal issues.
You may notify us that you need to have a Leave-of-Absence in #extended-loa

embeds.title: CONDITIONS FOR DISCHARGE
embeds.description:
To qualify for a general discharge, you must have:
**1.** Completed a month of service within the Royal Navy
**2.** Notified a Warrant or Commanding Officer of your intention to obtain a discharge.
**3.** Been relatively active (if you weren't active, chances are that you'll be dishonourably discharged)

If you desert (leave without notice), or you aren't active (without notice), you will be dishonourably discharged, which will lead into a 1 month blacklist within BAF

embeds.title: WESTBRIDGE RULES
embeds.description:
1) Do __NOT__ wear naval uniform on any team apart from BAF or RMP
2) If you are on BAF team you may only wear No.5s (Find in QM store)
3) Wear the correct headdress
4) Only leave reserves centre with a partner (LR+ can leave on their own)
5) Drive sensibly (You __CANNOT__ drive the moped or BAF Truck on team)
6) Act sensibly, do __NOT__ commit any crime on duty

embeds.title: RULES OF ENGAGEMENT
embeds.description:
__All enemy military personnel and vehicles transporting the enemy and their supplies may be engaged subjecting to the following conditions__

**A.** When possible the enemy will be warned first and asked to surrender
**B.** Armed force is a last resort
**C.** Armed civilians will only be engaged in self defence
**D.** Civilian aircraft will not be engaged
**E.** Civilians should not be harmed unless doing so is necessary to save lives. If possible, civilians should be removed before any attack
**F.** If civilians are in the area, shots should only be taken at known enemy locations
**G.** Public works such as power stations must not be attacked
**H.** Hospitals, shrines, churches, schools, museums and other historical and cultural sites will only be engaged in self defence
**I.** All indirect fire must be observed
